attributes.action: child benifit on a ehcp plan to the age of  25 in line with the plan
attributes.additional_details: if that are on  ehcp plan thay cant work as thay are still in collage ect
attributes.background: give child benifit to them on ehcp plan to the agf of  25 not 20

rejection.details:
Education, health and care (EHC) plans can already cover children and young people up to the age of 25.

The Government's guidance on EHC plans for 19 to 25 year olds is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/send-19-to-25-year-olds-entitlement-to-ehc-plans/send-19-to-25-year-olds-entitlement-to-ehc-plans

If you are unhappy with a decision your local authority has made about an EHC plan you could complain to your council, or raise this with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
